column4: i have 3 partitions and first one is winxp, second one is extend of it , 3rd one is ubuntu and i want also use the 2nd. one as an ubuntu file system but how can i do that?
whimsical , can i do it by typing mkfs?
i just want to store my documents in it
see the section about creating an ext3 partition here -- http://www.redhat.com/docs/manuals/linux/RHL-7.3-Manual/ref-guide/s1-filesystem-ext3-create.html
